StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateProgramMOSCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractID int, @ProgramMOSCode varchar(25), @LastEditBy varchar(50) )
AS
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[PROGRAM_MOS_CODES] WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID) BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[dbo].[PROGRAM_MOS_CODES] SET [PROGRAM_MOS_CODE] = @ProgramMOSCode ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[dbo].[PROGRAM_MOS_CODES] ([CONTRACT_ID],[PROGRAM_MOS_CODE],[USER_LOGIN],[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@ContractID,@ProgramMOSCode,@LastEditBy,GetDate()) END
